amendment.description: To provide, in a fiscally responsible manner, additional funding for United States attorneys to prosecute violent crimes in Indian country.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3317 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 31. Record Vote Number: 368.

Amendment SA 3317 proposed by Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S12854; text: CR S12854) To provide, in a fiscally responsible manner, additional funding for United States attorneys to prosecute violent crimes in Indian country.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3317 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 31. Record Vote Number: 368.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3317 proposed by Senator Thune.
